Ibuprofen tablet dosages for children
Age How much? How often
Age 7 to 9 years How much? 200mg How often? Max 3 times in 24 hours
Age 10 to 11 years How much? 200mg to 300mg How often? Max 3 times in 24 hours
Age 12 to 17 years How much? 200mg to 400mg How often? Max 3 times in 24 hours
